graph_title: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
indicator_name: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
data_footnote: Explanation for data sources: The first institution represents a data source, while the second institution is in charge in Montenegro.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Number of deaths, missing persons and directly affected persons attributed to disasters per 100,000 population
